job_tasks.phrase: leverage the latest in AI technology
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the use and application of AI technologies, which falls under the broader umbrella of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Harness the power of GenAI to dissect test results, uncover hidden patterns, and drive continuous improvement
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions using Generative AI (GenAI) for analysis and pattern discovery, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: simulating extreme scenarios and uncovering edge cases
job_tasks.justification: Simulating scenarios and identifying edge cases using AI implies the application of predictive or analytical models.

job_tasks.phrase: Craft intelligent, adaptive test automation frameworks
job_tasks.justification: Building and crafting frameworks is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Wield AI and automation as your weapons in the battle against software defects, ensuring lightning-fast releases without compromising quality
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of AI and automation within a software development context to achieve specific release goals.

soft_skills.phrase: uncover hidden patterns, and drive continuous improvement
simulating extreme scenarios and uncovering edge cases that others miss
Wield AI and automation as your weapons in the battle against software defects
Push the boundaries of software resilience

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using AI and GenAI for test automation and quality assurance, rather than building core AI models or applications. It lacks specific mention of core GenAI engineering responsibilities like fine-tuning LLMs, RAG systems, or agent development.
